Trade/Device Name(s): AutoSure Voice II Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AutoSure Voice II Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AutoSure Voice II Blood Glucose Monitoring System and AutoSure Blood Glucose Test Strips for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood samples from fingertips, forearm, or palm for self-testing by people with diabetes and clinical use by professionals; not indicated for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for neonatal use.
